body:
Hiya.
Here's a faithful edit I put together using other packs. Tell me how you like it! Give plenty of feedback on the video quality, pack, etc (whatever you feel needs improvement). Sorry about the Sony Vegas thing. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ICmejmCZsuU&feature=youtu.be

Download it here: http://www.mediafire.com/download/46xgwvhqf8qumap/Boxings_+Faithful+Edit%21+%5BNew%5D.zip
I understand that people get angry when others steal items from other packs without giving credit. Don't worry, references are in the video description to the original creators and packs.
OH YEAH.
This is here, unless you want to check it out for yourselves.
http://gyazo.com/15061dfe1064cc438a5ab9475467d7d9
http://gyazo.com/67dd5900eab2106f3fd429474da5830a
http://gyazo.com/2ba1126ca18bda95490d7c034625d39e 
http://gyazo.com/95f155bcb8ed3e75f03b2da9188d2781
The credits were requested to be that way by MLGtino. I just added his ideas to the mix.
Have a great day :)
